database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Proteomic analysis of nonsmall cell lung cancer
entry.description: These data correspond to PMID: 22761400, "In-depth proteomic analysis of nonsmall cell lung cancer to discover molecular targets and candidate biomarkers." (Mol Cell Proteomics. 2012 Oct;11(10):916-32. Epub 2012 Jul 3.)
